subject: Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: After two burnouts in the N.B.A., Brown has led Southern Methodist to a top-25 ranking for the first time since 1985 in his second year there.
snippet: After two burnouts in the N.B.A., Brown has led Southern Methodist to a top-25 ranking for the first time since 1985 in his second year there.
